paramInformation.label: Power Failure
paramInformation.description: Remember device status before the power failure

paramInformation.label: Overload safety switch
paramInformation.description: Turn off the controlled device in case of exceeding the defined power.

paramInformation.label: Power Reporting
paramInformation.description: Determines the minimum percentage change in active power consumption (in relation to the previously reported) that will result in sending new power report.

paramInformation.label: Energy Reporting Threshold
paramInformation.description: Determines the minimum change in energy consumption (in relation to the previously reported) that will result in sending a new report

paramInformation.label: Periodic Power Report
paramInformation.description: Defines time period between reports sent when changes in power load have not been recorded or if changes are smaller than defined in parameter 11. By default reports are sent every hour.

paramInformation.label: Periodic Energy Report
paramInformation.description: Defines time period between reports sent when changes in power load have not been recorded or if changes are smaller than in parameter 11. By default reports are sent every hour.

paramInformation.label: SelfConsumption
paramInformation.description: Determines whether power metering should include the amount of power consumed by the Wall Plug itself. Results are being added to the value of power consumed by controlled device.

paramInformation.label: UPValue
paramInformation.description: UP value -On/Off (Power) association group (3)

paramInformation.label: DOWNvalue
paramInformation.description: lower power threshold

paramInformation.label: ControlMode
paramInformation.description: the way that 3rd association group devices are controlled

paramInformation.label: SwitchOn
paramInformation.description: Command sent association group 2 when physical button is pressed

paramInformation.label: SwitchOff
paramInformation.description: Command sent association group 2 when button turned off.

paramInformation.label: ThresholdUpCmd
paramInformation.description: Command sent association group 3 if power exceeds param 21

paramInformation.label: ThresholdDownCmd
paramInformation.description: Command sent association group 3 when power drops below threshold

paramInformation.label: Active Alarms
paramInformation.description: Z-Wave network alarms to which the Wall Plug will respond

paramInformation.label: AlarmResponse
paramInformation.description: how the Wall Plug will respond to alarms.

paramInformation.label: AlarmDuration
paramInformation.description: duration of alarm state

paramInformation.label: PwrLoadViolet
paramInformation.description: Maximum active power value causes the LED frame to flash violet

paramInformation.label: LEDwhenOn
paramInformation.description: LED frame colour when controlled device is on

options.label: colour changes smoothly depending on active power
colour changes in steps depending on active power

paramInformation.label: LEDwhenOff
paramInformation.description: LED frame colour when controlled device is off

options.label: LED frame is illuminated with last colour

paramInformation.label: LEDwhenAlarm
paramInformation.description: LED frame colourat the Z-Wave network alarm detection
